items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Ada
items.content_text:
### Components / Apache License

*   [simple-components](http://www.dmitry-kazakov.de/ada/components.htm) - ASN.1, MQTT client and server/broker implementation, B-trees, Multiple connection TCP servers, Chebyshev series, Mutexes, Cryptography, Objects and handles to, Doubly-linked webs and lists, ODBC bindings, Blackboards (lock-free), OpenSSL bindings, ELV/eQ-3 MAX! client implementation, Parsers, Events (plain, pulse, array of), Persistent objects and handles to, GNUTLS bindings, Persistent storage and handles to, Graphs (directed, weighted, acyclic, trees), Pools, HTTP implementation, Sets and maps, FIFO (lock-free), SMTP client implementation, IEEE 754, SQLite bindings, Inter-process communication, Stacks, Interfacing Julia language, Streams, JSON, Strings editing, LDAP, Tables (maps of strings), MODBUS client implementation, Unbounded arrays.
items.content_html:
Components / Apache License

  • simple-components - ASN.1, MQTT client and server/broker implementation, B-trees, Multiple connection TCP servers, Chebyshev series, Mutexes, Cryptography, Objects and handles to, Doubly-linked webs and lists, ODBC bindings, Blackboards (lock-free), OpenSSL bindings, ELV/eQ-3 MAX! client implementation, Parsers, Events (plain, pulse, array of), Persistent objects and handles to, GNUTLS bindings, Persistent storage and handles to, Graphs (directed, weighted, acyclic, trees), Pools, HTTP implementation, Sets and maps, FIFO (lock-free), SMTP client implementation, IEEE 754, SQLite bindings, Inter-process communication, Stacks, Interfacing Julia language, Streams, JSON, Strings editing, LDAP, Tables (maps of strings), MODBUS client implementation, Unbounded arrays.

items.title: Awesome Security
items.content_text:
### Endpoint / Mobile / Android / iOS

*   [hardened\_malloc (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/GrapheneOS/hardened_malloc) - Hardened allocator designed for modern systems. It has integration into Android's Bionic libc and can be used externally with musl and glibc as a dynamic library for use on other Linux-based platforms. It will gain more portability / integration over time.

### DevOps / Development

*   [Securing DevOps](https://manning.com/books/securing-devops) - A book on Security techniques for DevOps that reviews state of the art practices used in securing web applications and their infrastructure.
*   [ansible-os-hardening (‚≠ê4.5k)](https://github.com/dev-sec/ansible-os-hardening) - Ansible role for OS hardening
items.content_html:
Endpoint / Mobile / Android / iOS

  • hardened_malloc (‚≠ê1.5k) - Hardened allocator designed for modern systems. It has integration into Android's Bionic libc and can be used externally with musl and glibc as a dynamic library for use on other Linux-based platforms. It will gain more portability / integration over time.

DevOps / Development

  • Securing DevOps - A book on Security techniques for DevOps that reviews state of the art practices used in securing web applications and their infrastructure.
  • ansible-os-hardening (‚≠ê4.5k) - Ansible role for OS hardening

items.title: Awesome Ruby
items.content_text:
### API Builder and Discovery

*   [Blueprinter (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/procore/blueprinter) - Simple, Fast, and Declarative Serialization Library for Ruby.

### GUI

*   [Glimmer (‚≠ê778)](https://github.com/AndyObtiva/glimmer) - Ruby DSL for SWT

### Web Crawling

*   [Kimurai (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/vifreefly/kimuraframework) - A modern web scraping framework written in Ruby which works out of box with Headless Chromium/Firefox, PhantomJS, or simple HTTP requests and allows to scrape and interact with JavaScript rendered websites.
items.content_html:
API Builder and Discovery

  • Blueprinter (‚≠ê1.2k) - Simple, Fast, and Declarative Serialization Library for Ruby.

GUI

  • Glimmer (‚≠ê778) - Ruby DSL for SWT

Web Crawling

  • Kimurai (‚≠ê1k) - A modern web scraping framework written in Ruby which works out of box with Headless Chromium/Firefox, PhantomJS, or simple HTTP requests and allows to scrape and interact with JavaScript rendered websites.

items.title: Awesome Geek Podcasts
items.content_text:
### In English

*   [Around IT In 256 Seconds](https://256.nurkiewicz.com/) - Podcast for developers, testers, SREs‚Ä¶ and their managers. I explain complex and convoluted technologies in a clear way, avoiding buzzwords and hype. Never longer than 4 minutes and 16 seconds.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Tall Stack
items.content_text:
### Learning

*   üé• [A contact form with Livewire and Tailwind CSS](https://stefanbauer.me/articles/a-contact-form-with-laravel-livewire) - Learn how to build a contact form with Livewire and Tailwind CSS.
*   üé• [Blade Component Cookbook](https://laracasts.com/series/blade-component-cookbook) - Learn how to build Blade components using Laravel, Tailwind CSS & Alpine.js.

*   ‚úçÔ∏è [Building complex forms with Laravel Livewire in Oh Dear](https://freek.dev/1609-building-complex-forms-with-laravel-livewire-in-oh-dear)

items.title: Awesome React Native
items.content_text:
### Media / Navigation Demos

*   [react-native-audio ‚òÖ798 (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/jsierles/react-native-audio) - Record and play back audio in your iOS or Android React Native apps. (no longer maintained)
*   [react-native-audio-toolkit ‚òÖ764 (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/react-native-community/react-native-audio-toolkit) - Audio playback and recording for react-native. In addition to basic functionality, many useful features are implemented such as seeking, looping and streaming audio files over the network.
items.content_html:
Media / Navigation Demos

  • react-native-audio ‚òÖ798 (‚≠ê1.2k) - Record and play back audio in your iOS or Android React Native apps. (no longer maintained)
  • react-native-audio-toolkit ‚òÖ764 (‚≠ê1.1k) - Audio playback and recording for react-native. In addition to basic functionality, many useful features are implemented such as seeking, looping and streaming audio files over the network.
